summary: Bin Zayed Group has entered into a partnership with Caduceus to bring a true city experience into the metaverse.  The Twin City metaverse experience will use VR technology to bring the city of Dubai into people’s homes, offering up all the city’s delights from its renowned shopping malls to its theme parks, and theater shows to the many famous cultural attractions it hosts.
title: Bin Zayed Group partners with Caduceus to build a Twin City Metaverse Experience
content: Bin Zayed Group has entered into a partnership with Caduceus to bring a true city experience into the metaverse.

The Twin City metaverse experience will use VR technology to bring the city of Dubai into people’s homes, offering up all the city’s delights from its renowned shopping malls to its theme parks, and theater shows to the many famous cultural attractions it hosts.

As Bin Zayed Group are leaders within architecture, property and commercial experience, and Caduceus has its unique decentralized Edge Rendering technology specific to metaverse development, the Twin City Experience will set the benchmark for the metaverse experience with no detail missed.

Caduceus CEO, Tim Bullman: “This is a phenomenal opportunity to set an example of what the metaverse can truly be. The ecosystem is huge and the idea of a metaverse is, at present, undefined and unlimited. By building the Twin City experience with Bin Zayed Group, we can show how real and considered it can feel and look - and from there, the metaverse can keep developing.”

Bin Zayed Group CEO, Midhat Kidwai: “Our partnership with Caduceus for the Twin City Experience brings together a vision we’ve held for some time - real estate, construction, and tech in one. We understand the level of detail and attention needed for beautiful and striking architecture, and Caduceus are the people that embody the ethos of the metaverse. Together, we can bring the life of Dubai to everyone.”

The Bin Zayed Group of Companies is a leading conglomerate with diverse business interests in the local and international markets. Over the years, its business ventures have expanded to include construction, energy, real estate, technology, trading, industry and investments.

The company was first established in 1988 by Sheikh Khaled Bin Zayed Al Nehayan as its Chairman, and has grown from an initial staff strength of about 25 people to its present strength of 5000 employees.

Caduceus is the world’s first metaverse protocol powered with decentralised edge rendering technology along with extended-reality to bring developers, creators, and users an unrivalled metaverse experience.
Founded and developed by a group of international investors and blockchain experts, Caduceus has brought together a range of talent to oversee this ambitious project.
To find out more head to: www.caduceus.foundation
